name: altar of dementia
card_description: Sacrifice a creature: Target player mills cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

name: final parting
card_description: Search your library for two cards. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Then shuffle.

card_description.Funeral Room:
Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
(You may cast either half. That door unlocks on the battlefield. As a sorcery, you may pay the mana cost of a locked door to unlock it.)
card_description.Awakening Hall:
When you unlock this door, return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
(You may cast either half. That door unlocks on the battlefield. As a sorcery, you may pay the mana cost of a locked door to unlock it.)
